segments.text: I observe the kitchen with its open window letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, attentively drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, the faucet's causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over, puddling on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong step and she could slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked nearby, vulnerable to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the upper cabinet holds the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar could end in a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside highlights the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races thinking of what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds and the water stops soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
